5aab68f4bdd984734b32d520fc17009d.text: Ready to start your lower body strength workout? Let's begin with a warm-up on your favorite cardio machine

6424b0c8558afdb45fd8ef92ce37f4fe.text: Let's get started with 4 sets of 5 reps

f7389a81344cd6feac2f84cc6d7d63e0.text: Now we are ready for back squats

a2549c9a70fbca7e5bc82c49e66e5672.text: Drive through your heels to return to standing

976a5e79102469aec872338a53c4c9f4.text: Lower into a squat position, going as low as you can while keeping your chest up

175b4ef8f6339ad44be4ecb69fa64ae9.text: Place your hands on your hips and engage your core

e14e6dbd74bef3f54ada4d8fb1f1130b.text: There will be 3 sets of 4 warm ups to activate muscles for squats.

581206b2b509e61234ef38bb7d1d4711.text: Hold for a moment, then return your hand to the ground

c476b56ab10c480d113d04306807eb61.text: Keep your chest up and core engaged as you descend into the squat

860ee110609448ca14f43bffc7d1635b.text: Rise back up halfway, then lower back down into the squat

6969cf05b1ec0e95ead2877f90d689b6.text: Step back to the starting position and repeat on the other side

6d6b00b0304beb8c96fc20f5914a2dbb.text: Next we have the one and a quarter air squat

2ac999b3c5dfb0d0b5b37561ffbeff06.text: Hold for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your hips back down to the starting position

9c14febb644a1cbbe4a2e01cbce132d2.text: First up is the world greatest stretch

c15e8f4114d9011d167a15f3292c4230.text: Now let's do the 90/90 ER hinge

3bcb87af1332baccbe8b4e9a1e7e9b7d.text: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart

bb194e00e50731fa571eb83c52ddc002.text: Return to the starting position and repeat on the other side

335c43901fdeb8aeb391ebbae51ee91b.text: Finally, we have the glute bridge

64e17219d72b2349a901d479525d4501.text: Lie on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground, hip-width apart

ebec53569c6bce0cd2514f8e821af832.text: Finally, stand all the way up to complete one rep

c7914fc045a6dfc66ec2a4f60d796915.text: Step one foot forward into a lunge position

1b98c6e8f79befb66cd9bdf28f02ef29.text: Rotate your torso and reach your arm up towards the ceiling

77b71f9e6db8a3a1397564ae3ed3aca5.text: Place both hands on the ground inside your front foot

21546dedb84244ad8a01bd98e742e5e4.text: Set up under the bar with it resting on your upper traps

2b3c9fd3da42831509072012b8e43e73.text: Sit on the ground with one leg bent in front of you at a 90-degree angle and the other leg bent behind you also at a 90-degree angle

86234364daba1aeb8b470e275fa2256b.text: Choose a rower, bike or even go for a run

f344ebb29029dd8c2afe5fe31075febe.text: Place your arms at your sides with palms facing down

e6258b50e47ed40f6778d2dc4aee74c6.text: Engage your core and squeeze your glutes as you lift your hips towards the ceiling

9f3617360d7b8003fda398f9e0e3f844.text: Hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight and chest up

fc1a19602fc990837cdf2017c9d4d652.text: Step back, I can't see your feet.

b672432aa3a838b6f0827c73ae1f8b0a.text: Move back, I can't see your head.
